definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: Fiesco, set free, encounters Paolo on his way to execution.
sentences.chinese: 菲耶斯科獲釋，並在與被押赴刑場的保羅在路上相遇。

sentences.english: According to Nyan Win, her lawyer, she should be released by Nov. 13.
sentences.chinese: 據其律師年溫說，她應該與11月13日獲釋。

sentences.english: Act II At the tavern, Zuniga tells Carmen that José has just been released.
sentences.chinese: 第二幕祖尼卡在酒館告訴卡門，賀塞已獲釋。

sentences.english: Dodonna was finally liberated after the Thrawn crisis.
sentences.chinese: 多登納最終在索龍危機後獲釋。

sentences.english: The officials freed under the amnesty have been restored to their posts.
sentences.chinese: 大赦中獲釋的原官員們已官復原職。

sentences.english: They were released after SSB officials raised the issue with Nepal's Armed Police Force.
sentences.chinese: 印方官員在向尼泊爾武裝部隊交涉後他們得以獲釋。

sentences.english: The officials freed under amnesty have been returned to their posts.
sentences.chinese: 大赦中獲釋的原官員們已官復原職。

sentences.english: He served three years of his four-year sentence and then was released for good behavior .
sentences.chinese: 他判刑四年，服滿三年後，因表現良好而提前獲釋。

sentences.english: Saddam to set an army of ex-prisoners against Washington's saboteurs.
sentences.chinese: 薩達姆大羣的獲釋囚徒對抗華盛頓派遣的蓄意破壞者。

sentences.english: Thirty security personnel are released safely in the south wazir is tan region of pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 在巴基斯坦的南瓦齊里斯坦有三十位安全人員獲釋。

sentences.english: After release, detainees are subject to a statutory supervision period of one year.
sentences.chinese: 羈留者獲釋後須接受爲期一年的法定監管。

sentences.english: Former presidential candidate Ingrid Betancourt is celebrating with her family, after being freed from more than six years in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 還有貝當古，獲釋後不久即表明她有意競選總統。

sentences.english: The authorities often know that sex offenders will attack again when they are released.
sentences.chinese: 當局一般都知道性犯罪者在獲釋後往往會再次犯案。

sentences.english: Husband von from from that for purgatory released.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫馮矬子從那苦熬的煉獄中獲釋了。

sentences.english: Last Two Beiruit Hostages 'To Go Free'. (The Last Two Hostages In Beiruit Are 'To Go Free'. )
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特最後兩名人質“獲釋在看”。

sentences.english: This MV was from Edgar's first album that was released in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 這支MV從趙太祥的第一張專輯是於2002年獲釋。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
